basics.name: Michael Telahun
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Michael has a Master's of Computer Science and Engineering from University of Louisville. His professional experience as a Data Scientist has been spent Modeling in Finance, Healthcare, Imaging, and Quantum Information Systems. He has built data products and data pipelines from several complex systems.

work.name: Luma Financial technologies
work.description: International Structured Products trading and managing platform
work.summary: Luma provides a single source platform for trading, managing and creating Structured Products. One of the core components of the business standardizes and homoginizes these products from their vast differences across companies into single data model.
highlights:
Developed data pipelines for key product metrics - Terraform, DBT, Snowflake, AWS, Python. 
• As a data engineer I sorted through 300+ product data features across multiple source systems (Mongo, SQL Server, PostgreSQL) and designed the data products. One of these data products is the calculations platform driven by over 60 features. This required centralizing industry knowledge and advising product managers

Developing portfolio based structured product recommender.
• Match high return products to client portfolios by building or suggesting products when purchasing

Developed data pipelines for user engagement – Terraform, DBT, Snowflake, Pendo. 
• I took client transaction, Pendo user actions, and internal data to develop a user journey or story

Developed Streamlit applications across managed structured products company wide
• View of similarity across structured products
• View of relationships between stocks, indices, and underlying assets
• Full dashboard of trading volume and opportunity
• Client portfolio and Issuing bank reporting

publications.name: Data Rotation and its Influence on Quantum Encoding
publications.summary: Effective quantum data pre-processing via embedded rotations.

publications.name: Aggregate Density Based Concept Drift Identification for Dynamic Sensor Data Models
publications.summary: Novel method for detecting when a model needs to be retrained prior to anyone knowing.

publications.name: Exploring Information for Quantum Machine Learning Model
publications.summary: Master Thesis - investigates several translations from classical to quantum optimzation problems.

publications.name: TensorFlow Quantum: Impacts of Quantum State Preparation on Quantum Machine Learning Performance
publications.summary: Analysis of cutting edge quantum feature maps using my own quantum-classical learning layer.

publications.name: Heuristic Analysis For In-Plane Non-Contact Calibration of Rulers Using Mask R-CNN
publications.summary: Measures objects in an image if the image contains a ruler, just snap a picture.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
